smsFormat.regex_Format: (?i).*BOI UPI .* Bank of India a/c [[account]] debited Rs.[[amount]] and credited to [[to]] -Ref.*
(?i).*BOI Rs.[ ]*[[amount]] Credited to your Ac [[account]] on [[date]] by UPI.*
(?i).*BOI-You have received Rs.[[amount]] from [[to]] to your A/C [[account]] on [[date]] by IMPS.*
